content.prompt: Bradley’s argument differs from Klein’s in that Bradley claims that

choices.label: some communist governments actually sought assistance from the United States
decolonization occurred in areas where the United States was given access to trade
the United States actively opposed colonialism in Asia but not in Africa
the Soviet Union supported decolonization so that it could limit the influence of the United States

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
